DOC.brief_summary: - Obesity important grow public health worldwide - Obesity highly related development metabolic syndrome , diabetes , cardiovascular disease cancer - An extensive body evidence efficacy trial show weight loss achievable , however , modest weight loss achieve small proportion patient - Important adverse event report use antiobesity drug . - The use natural product potential effect induce weight loss alternative strategy treat patient overweight obesity . However , efficacy safety evaluate RCT . - Obex combine different molecule potential effect induce weight loss control metabolic parameter fast glucose , cholesterol triglyceride . - Therefore , administration Obex overweight obese patient impaired fast glucose could excellent strategy induce weight loss ameliorate metabolic disturbance relate obesity overweight .
DOC.criteria: Overweight Obese subject without IFG Ability provide inform consent Presence diabetes mellitus , hepatic , renal cardiovascular disease Other disease associate insulin resistance ( eg . Acromegalia , endogenous hypercortisolism , etc ) Sepsis condition could potentially interfere treatment History bariatric surgery Pregnancy lactation Concomitant disease reduce life expectancy Severe psychiatric condition Anyone chronic medical condition require regular intake prescription medication . Used drug weight loss ( e.g. , Xenical [ orlistat ] , Meridia [ sibutramine ] , Acutrim [ phenylpropanolamine ] , Accomplia [ rimonabant ] , Alli [ lowdose orlistat ] , similar overthecounter weight loss remedy medication ) within 3 month screen Are actively participate , participate formal weight loss program within last 3 month
